projects.name: MIPS 5-Stage Pipeline Processor
highlights: Designed and simulated a 5-stage pipelined MIPS processor on Cyclone V SoC FPGA, based on 'Computer Organization and Design' by Patterson and Hennessy.
Implemented pipeline registers, forwarding, stalls, hazard detection, MUL instruction, and static branch prediction. Validated with Modelsim and FPGA testing.
Extended MIPS instruction set with MUL, optimizing pipeline control and reducing branch misprediction penalties.
Tested with QtSpim programs for factorial and Fibonacci calculations, verifying branch prediction, MUL instruction, and hazard detection.
[GitHub](https://github.com/the-pinbo/MIPS-5-Stage-Pipeline-Project/tree/main)

projects.name: MIPS Single-Cycle Processor

projects.name: RISC Stored-Program Machine (RISC SPM)

projects.name: Noise2Noise
highlights: Developed a neural network model to restore noisy images, trained on Gaussian noise, with zero mean and a nonzero variance, without using clean image priors.
Evaluated the performance of two models, REDNet and UNet, using mean PSNR and SSIM as metrics for inputs with a standard deviation of noise (Ïƒ) of 0.01, 0.02, and 0.03.

Observed that the ability of a network to denoise an image reduces as the noise value increases, with a higher rate of drop in SSIM in the case of UNet (drop from 0.645 to 0.374) compared to REDNet (drop from 0.577 to 0.435).
[GitHub](https://github.com/the-pinbo/image-denoising)
